settings.sub_heading: Through our authorized retail partners on [Amazon, Shipper and SG-firm, we are currently able to ship to Italy, Indonesia and Singapore. Once your order is placed, you will receive a confirmation with a tracking number [within 24h] and your products should be at your doorstep within [2-3 business days].
settings.desc_heading: *Estimated delivery timeline, actual delivery may vary. Shipments to suburban towns may experience longer delivery times.
settings.email_text: Should you ever feel unsatisfied with our product for any reason, feel free to reach out to our friendly Customer Care Team at
